xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="serviceName"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains('${service name}', '@')"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before('${service name}', '@')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${service name}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="service"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host]/services/service/@name = $serviceName"> <xsl:value-of select="$serviceName" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <commands> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ])"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service])"> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/start" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/stop" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@name = $host and @os-type = '${os type}' ]/services/service[@name = $service]/restart" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </commands> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//commands/start/command"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:element name="{$nodeName}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//commands/start/command/text(), "ORACLESID")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before(//commands/start/command/text(), "ORACLESID"), "${oracle sid}",substring-after(//commands/start/command/text(), "ORACLESID"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(//commands/start/command/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//commands/stop/command"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:element name="{$nodeName}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//commands/stop/command/text(), "ORACLESID")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before(//commands/stop/command/text(), "ORACLESID"), "${oracle sid}",substring-after(//commands/stop/command/text(), "ORACLESID"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(//commands/stop/command/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//commands/command[1]"> <xsl:variable name="nodeName" select="name()" /> <xsl:element name="{$nodeName}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains(//commands/command[1]/text(), "ORACLESID")"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(substring-before(//commands/command[1]/text(), "ORACLESID"), "${oracle sid}",substring-after(//commands/command[1]/text(), "ORACLESID"))" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string(//commands/command[1]/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
Create commands for service start, stop and restart. Output format will be:
<commands> <start/> <stop /> <restart /> </commands>
